text: Ojo nadidi, ki Alloh taolo aʙrhoero ʙa oromi meronad, sipas ʙajni [aczoi] on pajvand medihad, on goh tudai anʙuhe padid meovarad, pas, qatrahoi ʙoronro meʙini, ki az mijonas tarovis mekunad va az kuhhoe [az anʙuhi aʙrho], ki dar osmon ast, donahoi ƶola furu meʙorad, pas, onro ʙa har ki ʙixohad furu merezad va az har ki ʙixohad ʙozmedorad. Nazdik ast, duraxsandagii ʙarqas casmhoro [az ʙajn] ʙarad
